entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
